title: MAGIX Movie Edit Pro 2014 Premium 13.0.5.4 (Eng) [ChingLiu]
description:
Advanced video editing.

4K Ã¢â‚¬â€œ The revolution for your videos.

Twice as big, four times as sharp. The new 4K Ultra HD format can display images in more detail than Full HD. Experience your videos in unparalleled quality. Only MAGIX Movie Edit Pro offers the perfect workflow for editing your own Ultra HD videos. Whether it's footage of sporting events from a GoPro or holiday videos from your camcorder, take full advantage of the potential of your video camera and get the best image quality possible.

Get started on the go. Perfect at home.

With MAGIX Movie Edit Touch for Windows tablets you can now edit your videos right where you made them Ã¢â‚¬â€œ on vacation, at family celebrations or at a live show. Quickly and easily remove unwanted scenes, change the scene order and add some text and titles. When you get home you can import and edit projects in MAGIX Movie Edit Pro 2014 Plus.

Impressively new. Incredibly fast.

More options for your videos.
-Even fast loading times when editing and exporting
-Optimized toolbar in the timeline for a better workflow
-Enhanced user interface with touch elements
-Support of the new video standard 4K video standard Ã¢â‚¬â€œ Ideal for action cameras such as GoPro
-Edit 4K and HD footage without it juddering using proxy editing
-Improved multi-track performance makes more efficient use of multi-core systems
-Intel Wireless Display support used to stream videos from Movie Edit Pro
-High dynamic range effects Ã¢â‚¬â€œ unique contrast values
-Redesigned transition dialogs now integrated in the Mediapool
-Optimized 3D transition preview which uses faster GPU calculation in HD
-Faster effect calculation using the graphics processor
-High-quality decorative elements and intro/outro templates
-Additional templates for impressive movie trailers
-New, stylishly animated menu templates
-Mobile video editing MAGIX Movie Edit Touch for Windows 8 tablets

What is new in this version?

Important changes in version 13.0.5.4 compared to version 13.0.4.4

 - Function for receiving projects from Movie Edit Touch for Android
 - Minor fixes when uploading to showfy
 - Fixed problems for certain effects when rendering on CPU

Supported operating systems

For Microsoft Windows XP | Vista | 7 | 8 (32-bit and 64-bit)

Minimum System Requirements

All MAGIX programs are developed with user-friendliness in mind so that all the basic features run smoothly and can be fully controlled, even on low-performance computers. Check your operating systemÃƒÂ¢Ã‚â‚¬Ã¢â€žÂ¢s control panel for technical information about your computer.

-Processor: Dual core processor with 2.0 GHz
-RAM: 1 GB
-Onboard graphics card with a screen resolution of at least 1024 x 768
-Sound card: Internal sound card
-Hard drive space: 2 GB for program installation
-Optical drive: DVD drive (only for installation of the box version)
-Internet connection: An Internet connection is required to activate the software
